DOC.brief_summary: The Nit-Occlud PDA Post-Approval Study is designed to continue to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the device in the post-approval phase.
DOC.criteria: Angiographically confirmed PDA with minimum diameter < 4 mm. Weight is ≥ 5 kg. Age 6 months to 21 years. Cardiac anomalies requiring surgery. Known bleeding or coagulation disorder. Febrile illness within 7 days of planned procedure. Pregnancy. Pulmonary hypertension with increased pulmonary vascular resistance (≥ 5 Wood Units). Hypersensitivity to contrast medium. Known nickel allergy.
